titleStmt.title: The Lord Chancellor's speech upon the Lord Treasurer's taking his oath i[n] the Exchequer, the fifth of December, 1672
titleStmt.author: Shaftesbury, Anthony Ashley Cooper, Earl of, 1621-1683.

notesStmt.note: Anthony Ashley Cooper, Earl of Shaftesbury, became Lord Chancellor in November of 1672, and had lost favor with Charles II by November of the following year when the King demanded back the seals of office. The Lord Treasurer was Baron Thomas Clifford. Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in British Library.
This item appears at reel 297:20 as Wing (CD-ROM, 1996) S2904, and at reel 770:1 as Wing N1406 (number cancelled in Wing CD-ROM, 1996).
